enter_item: ⚠️ PLEASE NOTE: Since the majority of listings on Tori is in Finnish, you should use the name of an item in Finnish as well. Otherwise, if you will be searching an item in different language, most probably it won't give any results. 🤷‍♂️ 🔍 Please enter the name of an item you're looking for:
invalid_item: ❗ Please enter an item name between 3 and 64 characters.
invalid_product_category: ❗ Please select a valid product type!
missing_data: ❗ The following data is missing: {missing}. Please start over.
items_list: 🛒 Here are the items you're currently looking for:
no_items: You haven't added any items yet! 🤷‍♂️
more_10: ⛔️ Sorry, you can't search for more than 10 items simultaneously. Please remove one or more items first!
invalid_choice: 🤷‍♂️ There is no such choice. Please make a valid selection.
contact_developer_prompt: 🧑‍💻 Contact the developer: 👋 Telegram: @arealibusadrealiora 💼 Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergii-dobrovoljskii/ ✉️ E-mail: arealibusadrealiora@proton.me⚠️ PLEASE NOTE: I (the developer) am not related to tori.fi or Schibsted Media Group in any way so I can only answer questions regarding the bot functionality (or have a chit-chat with you 🤗). If you need assistance with your deals or anything related directly to tori.fi, you should probably contact their support: https://tuki.tori.fi/
